import axios from"axios";var networkClient=function networkClient(headers){var axiosInstance=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL});axiosInstance.interceptors.request.use(function(config){if(headers){if(headers.token){//
}}return config;},function(error){return Promise.reject(error);});axiosInstance.interceptors.response.use(function(response){return response;},function(error){var icError={statusCode:error.response.status,errorMessage:"",externalErrorMessage:""};return Promise.reject(icError);});return axiosInstance;};export default networkClient;
